factText: Tonight, I am still thinking about these people in the southern part of our state recovering following the deadly tornado there this week.

Non-profit agencies and volunteer clean-up crews are assisting property owners in Onalaska and Seven Oaks that have been impacted by the storm with property clean up. TABC agents are on the ground in Polk County to assist local and state officials responding to the Onalaska, Texas tornado. They have been feeding the rescue workers, the residents impacted by the devastation, and the volunteers helping this area.

Southern Florida could see some isolated severe storms today. NB – The storm is expected to be accompanied by moderate to strong winds🌪. ALERT #weather #duststorm #rain. There is a storm brewing for sure!!!. Expect showers today and possibly a rumble of thunder or two this afternoon.

🥵 An Excessive Heat Warning is in effect today and tomorrow. #HPMet issues yellow alert for April 27, Predicts Thunderstorm, hail and gusty winds. Heard the first Warnings from NOAA on VHF around 10:00 but storms were north PSL and said to be moving NE. Storms without a #tornado can be just a dangerous as storms with tornadoes!. At this time we expect any thunderstorms to stay to our west but it will bear watching. #OTD (4-26) in 1991: The Plains #Tornado Outbreak.

"Extreme coastal flooding events will become commonplace at nine-in-10 US coastal sites as sea levels continue to rise around the planet, new research suggests.⁣ ⁣. Sea level rise is slow but continues to accelerate as climate change increases. Heavy rain continues for much of the state, but there a little hole in central Ohio giving areas like #Columbus a bit of a break.
These items are badly needed by our neighbors recovering from the tornado
Here is our summary on the F5 of the day: The Wichita-Andover Tornado: 46 mile path, 700 yard width, 17 fatalities, 225 injuries.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-017_Tornado_What was the path length and width of the tornado?

factText: An Onalaska church will be sending people out into the community today to help clean-up following Wednesday's deadly tornado. The Onalaska/350/Leggett communities here in Polk County were hit hard by the recent tornado please help if you can.
Willow Lane over on the northwest side of town was hit hard as the tornado then tracked over to Cox Farms, the Turnpike and then up to Andover.
A powerful tornado damaged hundreds of homes in the community on April 22, 2020. Tornado Destroys More than 170 Homes in One Texas Town | The Weather Channel
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-017_Tornado_How many structures were completely destroyed due to {event}?

factText: Brenda Fernandez and Jim Harrison of The American Red Cross conduct damage assessment from a tornado in Onalaska, TX, on Friday, April 24, 2020. Happening Today — Singer/Songwriter Eli Ensor is hosting a #Tornado Relief Concert to benefit Samaritan's Purse!. “ The State Bar of Texas and Lone Star Legal Aid seek to alert residents that free legal resources are available to low-income individuals affected by the devastating tornado April 22 in Polk County.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-017_Tornado_What emergency shelters are open specifically for tornado victims?

factText: 🇨🇱VOLUNTEERS NEEDED!!🇨🇱Samaritan’s Purse is in Onalaska going house to house to help clean up houses and debris, and they are needing volunteers.
Sunday, 4/26 – Tornado Recovery Progress We’ve covered a lot of ground and made good progress today.
Clouds are starting to thicken up just a bit as our next disturbance tracks eastward.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-017_Tornado_Are meteorologists predicting more tornadoes following {event}?

factText: · Under the first CARES Act bill enacted last month, hospitals have wide flexibility in how the funding can be used for COVID-19 costs, including the provision of testing and laboratory services, and purchase of personal protective equipment.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-017_general_What medical services are available for affected individuals?

factText: The #NationalWeatherService confirms an EF-2 #tornado hit part of Greenville County Saturday night. A few days after we finished a tornado came through and destroyed Seneca SC and then passed through Dacusville area. This tornado also hit Haysville. Madill, Okla. faced a deadly EF2 tornado which claimed the lives of two Texomans and caused serious damages to homes and buildings. Today is the 29th Anniversary of what became known as the "Andover Tornado."

🌧 The Weather Bureau is forecasting some showers about the Riverland and Murraylands from midweek. Spring rains are just around the corner, or have already started to impact some areas across the country.
The tornado killed 17 people and injured over 200. The NWS would rate this tornado an F5, killing 19 people in KS.

We’ve been really impressed with how the local community is helping each other out despite some truly astonishing storm damage that this area took and having to follow the ongoing social distancing guidelines.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-017_general_Are evacuation orders still in place or have they been lifted?

factText: An EF-2 Tornado touched down Saturday evening 3 miles from our studio and cuts off the power during our live broadcast. A massive, wedge tornado devastated parts of the Wichita Metro and later ripped through Andover on this day, 29 years ago.
